TextId_Already_Running: An instance of MinimizeToTray is already running.
TextId_Tray_Opt_AltF4_Force_Exit_Desc: Alt-F4 forces window's process to exit
TextId_Tray_Opt_Alt_Esc_Focus_Change_Des: Auto Alt+Esc for smooth focus on hide
TextId_GUI_Warning_Key_Overlap: ESC key and ALT-F4 cannot be selected because they will interfere with system hotkeys.
TextId_Msg_Help_4_Stored_In_Tray: Hidden Windows are stored in MTT tray icon.
TextId_Msg_Help_5_Elevated_Window_Admin: If the window you want to hide is elevated to administrative level, you must run MTT as Administrator.
